statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id FROM support_tickets WHERE resolved = true
SELECT resolution_description FROM support_tickets
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT ticket_id, resolved FROM support_tickets ORDER BY resolved, created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resolution_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = '8aa1371a-6548-4599-8485-1de3a4f949e7';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, resolved FROM support_tickets WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_date, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_date FROM tickets WHERE ticket_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.ticket_id, tr.resolution_details FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_resolution tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, resolution_details FROM tickets INNER JOIN ticket_resolution ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_resolution.ticket_id WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM tickets ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_date, issue_description, resolution_date, resolution_details FROM tickets LEFT JOIN ticket_resolution ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_resolution.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, creation_date FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM resolution_history WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, creation_date FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, r.resolution_description FROM customer_support_tickets t INNER JOIN resolution_history r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_description FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_agents WHERE agent_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT * FROM tickets JOIN customers ON tickets.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY tickets.ticket_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_description, ticket_status FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT department_name, employee_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department=departments.department_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT ticket_id FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status='Closed');
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_description FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, resolution_description FROM customers LEFT JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id=tickets.ticket_id WHERE ticket_status='Open';
